WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working as of most recent commit
WorkItem.Description: The "Options" tab changes do not propagate into modelling code, calculation options are not changed.

Comments.Message: I've added a patch (#6538) that fixes problem (it still uses reflection which isn't good for Rawr3, but at least it works in standalone Rawr).
In Rawr 2 or Rawr 3, and specifically which options?  Also, which version?

Rawr 2, all options, current version, tested with r52460/2.3.21, the functionality itself was broken with r51889 (where fields in CalculationOptionsRestoSham got replaced with properties).
P.S. I use svn to checkout, I'm not sure if svn revisions map 1-to-1 to TFS ones.
"All options" mean "any controls on the Options tab", buffs/talents work fine.

Should be fixed in most recent commit, though please check if you can since I prefer two sets of eyes over one.  It's unfortunate, but the changes in 51889 on my model were not done by me, and also were not tested.
It works now (I checked out r53387), thanks for the fix.
